text: Hagi ke refkohu kva vahe'ma zamazeri oti'noa knafima ko'ma hu'nazaza hu'za, mago'a kumate vahe'mo'za keonkezantamia emeri havizana nehu'za hazenkea ozamigahaze. Hagi maka ha' vaheka'a zamahehna nehu'na, kagri nagara zamazeri hankavetina zamazeri ra ha'nena, kagri nagapinti kva vahera mani'za vugahaze.
